dict.string: Mojito
White Rum, Fresh Mint Leaves, Lime Juice, Soda Water, Granulated Sugar, Ice Cubes
Aochle0
In the bottom of a tall glass, put 10 - 15 fresh mint leaves and a teaspoon of granulated sugar. Use a muddler to gently crush them to release the mint aroma.
Add an ounce of lime juice and continue to mash gently.
Fill the glass three-quarters full with ice cubes and pour in two ounces of white rum.
Slowly pour in soda water until the glass is full. Stir gently to mix well. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint.
Sex on the Beach
Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice, Orange Slices for decoration
Aochle1
Add ice cubes to a shaker. Put in 1.5 ounces of vodka, 0.5 ounce of peach schnapps, 2 ounces of cranberry juice and 2 ounces of orange juice.
Shake the shaker evenly. Strain the liquid through a strainer into a highball glass.
Place an orange slice on the rim for decoration.
Margarita
Tequila, Cointreau, Fresh Lime Juice, Coarse Salt, Lime Wedges for decoration
Aochle2
Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime wedge. Then, turn the rim upside down and dip it into a plate of coarse salt to create a salted rim.
Put ice cubes into a shaker, pour in Tequila, Cointreau and Fresh Lime Juice.
Shake the shaker vigorously until the mixture is well blended. Strain the liquid through a strainer into a prepared cocktail glass.
Finally, place a lime wedge on the rim for decoration.
Cosmopolitan
Vodka, Cointreau, Cranberry Juice, Fresh Lime Juice, Orange Peel for decoration
Aochle3
Add ice cubes to a shaker. Put in 1.5 ounces of vodka, 0.5 ounce of Cointreau, 2 ounces of cranberry juice and 0.5 ounce of fresh lime juice.
Shake the shaker until frost forms on the outside. Strain the liquid through a strainer into a martini glass.
Take an orange peel and gently rub it around the rim of the glass to release the orange oil. Then drop the orange peel into the glass as decoration.
Pi√±a Colada
Rum, Coconut Cream, Pineapple Juice, Ice Cubes, Pineapple Slices for decoration
Aochle4
Combine 1.5 ounces of rum, 1 ounce of coconut cream and 3 ounces of pineapple juice in a blender. Add a handful of ice cubes.
Blend the mixture until it becomes a smooth, slushy consistency.
Pour the blended mixture into a tall glass. Place a slice of pineapple on the rim for decoration.
Daiquiri
White Rum, Fresh Lime Juice, Granulated Sugar, Ice Cubes, Lime Wedges for decoration
Aochle5
Fill a shaker with ice cubes. Pour in 2 ounces of white rum, 1 ounce of fresh lime juice and 0.5 ounce of granulated sugar.
Shake the shaker vigorously to dissolve the sugar completely and blend the ingredients well.
Strain the liquid through a strainer into a cocktail glass. Place a lime wedge on the rim for decoration.
Long Island Iced Tea
Vodka, Rum, Gin, Tequila, Cointreau, Lemon Juice, Coke, Ice Cubes, Lemon Wedges for decoration
Aochle6
Put ice cubes into a shaker. Add 0.5 ounce each of vodka, rum, gin, tequila and Cointreau, and 0.5 ounce of lemon juice.
Shake the shaker evenly. Strain the liquid through a strainer into a highball glass.
Slowly pour in coke until the glass is three-quarters full. Place a lemon wedge on the rim for decoration.
Singapore Sling
Gin, Cherry Brandy, Lemon Juice, Soda Water, Grenadine Syrup, Ice Cubes, Cherries and Orange Slices for decoration
Aochle7
Add ice cubes to a shaker. Put in 1.5 ounces of gin, 0.5 ounce of cherry brandy, 0.5 ounce of lemon juice and 0.5 ounce of grenadine syrup.
Shake the shaker evenly. Strain the liquid through a strainer into a highball glass.
Slowly pour in soda water until the glass is three-quarters full. Place a cherries and an orange slice on the rim for decoration.
